mapper.sql: id,dzbm,dzmc,bmjc, zxdhzb,zxdzzb,dzzt,sszdyjxzqy_xzqhdm,sszdyjxzqy_xzqhmc, ss_xzjddm,ssxzjdmc,ss_sqjcwhdm,sssqjcwhmc, ssjlx_dzbm,ssjlxmc,ssxq_dzbm,ssxqmc, ssjzw_dzbm,ssjzwmc,ssdyfw_dzbm,ssdyfwmc, to_char(sjscsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as sjscsj, to_char(gxsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as gxsj, dzlyfl,dzly_xzqhdm, dzly_dwmc,dzly_xtmc,dzly_wybs,bz,kjzb
mapper.insert:
insert into anhui_addr_fbzdz (dzbm,dzmc,bmjc, zxdhzb,zxdzzb,dzzt,sszdyjxzqy_xzqhdm,sszdyjxzqy_xzqhmc, ss_xzjddm,ssxzjdmc,ss_sqjcwhdm,sssqjcwhmc, ssjlx_dzbm,ssjlxmc,ssxq_dzbm,ssxqmc, ssjzw_dzbm,ssjzwmc,ssdyfw_dzbm,ssdyfwmc, sjscsj,gxsj,dzlyfl,dzly_xzqhdm, dzly_dwmc,dzly_xtmc,dzly_wybs,bz) values
(#{fbzdz.dzbm},#{fbzdz.dzmc},#{fbzdz.bmjc},#{fbzdz.zxdhzb}, #{fbzdz.zxdzzb},#{fbzdz.dzzt},#{fbzdz.sszdyjxzqy_xzqhdm},#{fbzdz.sszdyjxzqy_xzqhmc}, #{fbzdz.ss_xzjddm},#{fbzdz.ssxzjdmc},#{fbzdz.ss_sqjcwhdm},#{fbzdz.sssqjcwhmc}, #{fbzdz.ssjlx_dzbm},#{fbzdz.ssjlxmc},#{fbzdz.ssxq_dzbm},#{fbzdz.ssxqmc}, #{fbzdz.ssjzw_dzbm},#{fbzdz.ssjzwmc},#{fbzdz.ssdyfw_dzbm},#{fbzdz.ssdyfwmc}, #{fbzdz.sjscsj},#{fbzdz.gxsj},#{fbzdz.dzlyfl},#{fbzdz.dzly_xzqhdm}, #{fbzdz.dzly_dwmc},#{fbzdz.dzly_xtmc},#{fbzdz.dzly_wybs},#{fbzdz.bz})
mapper.select: select max(id) as maxid from anhui_addr_fbzdz where gxsj BETWEEN to_date(#{beginTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(#{endTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
select max(id) as maxid from anhui_addr_fbzdz where id <= #{id}
select count(1) from anhui_addr_fbzdz where gxsj BETWEEN to_date(#{beginTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(#{endTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
mapper.delete: delete from anhui_addr_fbzdz where id in (select id from anhui_addr_fbzdz where dzmc in (select dzmc from anhui_addr_fbzdz where id BETWEEN #{beginId} and #{endId} group by dzmc having count(1) > 1))
delete from anhui_addr_fbzdz where id in (select id from anhui_addr_fbzdz where zxdhzb <= 0 or zxdhzb >= 180 or zxdzzb <= 0 or zxdzzb >= 90 and id BETWEEN #{beginId} and #{endId})

delete from anhui_addr_fbzdz where id in( select a.id from anhui_addr_fbzdz as a left join xzqh_province_py as b on a.city = b.namec where public.st_within(public.st_makepoint(a.zxdhzb,a.zxdzzb),b.geom) = false and a.id BETWEEN #{beginId} and #{endId})
